argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hlatlej.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 2 |  | hlatlej.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 3 |  | hlatlej.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_hllat | |- ( K e. HL -> K e. Lat ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 6 | 5, 3 | #P_atbase | |- ( P e. A -> P e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 3 | #P_atbase | |- ( Q e. A -> Q e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 1, 2 | #P_latlej1 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ P e. ( Base ` K ) /\ Q e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> P .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) |
| 9 | 4, 6, 7, 8 | #P_syl3an | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> P .<_ ( P .\/ Q ) ) |
